roleset.name: sneak, hang around in dark places
roleset.note: LURK-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls exist-47.1-1 (from lurk.01-v)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: But the lurking shadow of 1987's stock-market crash still seems dark.

example.name: ARG0
example.text: Even as discussion on missile systems continues , an unprecedented form of threat - third - wave warfare - is lurking .
example.arg: Even as discussion on missile systems continues
an unprecedented form of threat - third - wave warfare
